title: Off on a natural charge, bon voyage - RIP ODB
body: <p>Legendary rapper Russell Jones AKA Ol' Dirty Bastard AKA ODB AKA Osirus AKA Joe Bannanas [sic] AKA Dirt Dog AKA Unique Ason AKA Big Baby Jesus AKA Dirt McGuirt died at the age of 35 on Saturday. Coincedentally today would've been his 36th birthday. In the past he'd been arrested for stealing $50 sneakers, making terrorist threats, driving with a suspended license, failure to pay child support (he had 13 children), and many drug-related charges. He had miraculously survived getting shot in the past, attempted to sabotage the Grammy's, and he once saved a 4 year old girl who was pinned underneath a car. Aside from his many kids (and baby's mommas), he is survived by his wife of 13 years Icelene Jones. More info on <a href="http://news.google.com/news?q=ODB" title=":-(">Google News</a>, <a href="http://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1493725/20041113/ol_dirty_bastard.jhtml?headlines=true" title=":-(">MTV had the best write-up</a>.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-11-15

Off on a natural charge, bon voyage - RIP ODB

Legendary rapper Russell Jones AKA Ol' Dirty Bastard AKA ODB AKA Osirus AKA Joe Bannanas [sic] AKA Dirt Dog AKA Unique Ason AKA Big Baby Jesus AKA Dirt McGuirt died at the age of 35 on Saturday. Coincedentally today would've been his 36th birthday. In the past he'd been arrested for stealing $50 sneakers, making terrorist threats, driving with a suspended license, failure to pay child support (he had 13 children), and many drug-related charges. He had miraculously survived getting shot in the past, attempted to sabotage the Grammy's, and he once saved a 4 year old girl who was pinned underneath a car. Aside from his many kids (and baby's mommas), he is survived by his wife of 13 years Icelene Jones. More info on
